name: Tweet Reel
description: Share video on Twitter with the iPhone
overview:
Tweet Reel is an iPhone application that lets users upload pictures and video, and share them on Twitter. Tweet Reel is helping to fuel the explosion in the mobile video space on the iPhone.

Apple’s latest iPhone hardware device, the iPhone 3GS added a much desired feature, the ability to record video from the device’s camera. Traditionally, Twitter users have only been uploading still images, but with the 3G network hardware and video camera iPhone users are beginning to demand much more.

Tweet Reel gives Twitter users an application that runs on their iPhone, and a page that hosts their media online so that it can be shared on Twitter.
